Not heating

descriptions.en: Used to specify (in Celsius) the temperature of heated water to be achieved, and to acquire the current setting.

propertyName.en: Manual water heating stop days setting

descriptions.en: Used to specify manually the number of days to stop 'automatic water heating'.

propertyName.ja: エネルギーシフト参加状態

descriptions.ja: エネルギーシフトへの対応を示す。「参加要請確定時刻」に、値が確定し、沸き上げシフト時刻にクリア(0x00)される
descriptions.en: This property indicates a response in energy shift. The value is set when a value is determined at participation request and cleared at the heating shift time (0x00).
Participation
Non Participation

remark.ja: サービス提供者と本クラス搭載機器の利用者間で、エネルギーシフト(昼間沸き上げ)に対し合意が得られている前提で利用する。また、沸き上げ開始基準時刻は、契約時に決定されていることとする
remark.en: Use the device on the assumption that an agreement between service provider and user of devices implementing this class is obtained for energy shift (daytime heating). Note that the standard time to start heating may be determined when establishing a contract.

propertyName.ja: 沸き上げ開始基準時刻

descriptions.ja: 「昼間沸き上げシフト時刻1及び昼間沸き上げシフト時刻2(エネルギーシフトの回数が2回の機器のみ)」を確定する時刻
descriptions.en: Time when daytime heating shift time 1 and daytime heating shift time 2 are determined (only for devices that carry out energy shifts twice).

remark.ja: サービス提供者と本クラス搭載機器の利用者間で、エネルギーシフト(昼間沸き上げ)に対し合意が得られている前提で利用する。また、沸き上げ開始基準時刻は、契約時に決定されていることとする
remark.en: Use the device on the assumption that an agreement between service provider and user of devices implementing this class is obtained for energy shift (daytime heating). Note that the standard time to start heating may be determined when establishing a contract.

propertyName.ja: エネルギーシフト回数

descriptions.ja: エネルギーシフトする回数を確認する
descriptions.en: Check the number of energy shifts carried out

remark.ja: サービス提供者と本クラス搭載機器の利用者間で、エネルギーシフト(昼間沸き上げ)に対し合意が得られている前提で利用する。また、沸き上げ開始基準時刻は、契約時に決定されていることとする
remark.en: Use the device on the assumption that an agreement between service provider and user of devices implementing this class is obtained for energy shift (daytime heating). Note that the standard time to start heating may be determined when establishing a contract.

propertyName.ja: 昼間沸き上げシフト時刻1

descriptions.ja: 1回目の「昼間沸き上げシフト時刻」を示す。また、未設定時の値を0x00と定義する
descriptions.en: This property indicates 'daytime heating shift time' for the first time. The value when there are no settings shall be defined as 0x00.

descriptions.ja: 17時(エネルギーシフト回数が2回の場合はこの値無効になる)
descriptions.en: 17:00 (this value is nullified if energy shifts occur twice.)
Undefined

remark.ja: サービス提供者と本クラス搭載機器の利用者間で、エネルギーシフト(昼間沸き上げ)に対し合意が得られている前提で利用する。また、沸き上げ開始基準時刻は、契約時に決定されていることとする
remark.en: Use the device on the assumption that an agreement between service provider and user of devices implementing this class is obtained for energy shift (daytime heating). Note that the standard time to start heating may be determined when establishing a contract.

propertyName.ja: 昼間沸き上げシフト時刻1での沸き上げ予測電力量
propertyName.en: Expected electric energy at daytime heating shift time 1

descriptions.ja: 「昼間沸き上げ開始基準時刻」に設定された「昼間沸き上げシフト時刻1」での沸き上げに要する電力量予測値1を示すシフト時刻に応じ、順に10時、13時、15時､17時の各時刻に対応する電力量をWhで示す「シフト時刻毎消費電力確定時刻」に値が確定し、「昼間沸き上げシフト時刻1」に、時刻毎のデータはクリア(0x00000000)される
descriptions.en: This property indicates the expected electric energy 1 required for heating for 'daytime heating shift time 1' set as 'daytime standard time to start heating'.This property indicates electric power in Wh according to shift time, corresponding to these times in sequence: 10:00, 13:00, 15:00, and 17:00.The value is set when a value is determined at a time to determine consumption of electric energy at every shift time and a data at every time is cleared (0x00000000) at the daytime heating shift time 1.

remark.ja: サービス提供者と本クラス搭載機器の利用者間で、エネルギーシフト(昼間沸き上げ)に対し合意が得られている前提で利用する。また、沸き上げ開始基準時刻は、契約時に決定されていることとする
remark.en: Use the device on the assumption that an agreement between service provider and user of devices implementing this class is obtained for energy shift (daytime heating). Note that the standard time to start heating may be determined when establishing a contract.

propertyName.ja: 時間あたり消費電力量1
propertyName.en: Consumption of electric energy per hour 1

descriptions.ja: 「昼間沸き上げシフト時刻1」にシフトした時にHP給湯機が、時間当たりに消費する電力量1を示す「シフト時刻毎消費電力確定時刻」に値が確定し、「昼間沸き上げシフト時刻1」に、時刻毎データはクリア(0x0000)される
descriptions.en: This property indicates electric energy 1 that the HP water heater consumes per hour when shifting to 'daytime heating shift time 1'.The value is set when a value is determined at a time to determine consumption of electric energy at every shift time and a data at every time is cleared (0x0000) at the daytime heating shift time 1.

remark.ja: サービス提供者と本クラス搭載機器の利用者間で、エネルギーシフト(昼間沸き上げ)に対し合意が得られている前提で利用する。また、沸き上げ開始基準時刻は、契約時に決定されていることとする
remark.en: Use the device on the assumption that an agreement between service provider and user of devices implementing this class is obtained for energy shift (daytime heating). Note that the standard time to start heating may be determined when establishing a contract.

propertyName.ja: 昼間沸き上げシフト時刻2

descriptions.ja: 2回目の「昼間沸き上げシフト時刻」を示す。また、未設定時の値を0x00と定義する
descriptions.en: This property indicates 'daytime heating shift time' for the second time. The value when no setting shall be defined as 0x00.
Undefined

remark.ja: サービス提供者と本クラス搭載機器の利用者間で、エネルギーシフト(昼間沸き上げ)に対し合意が得られている前提で利用する。また、沸き上げ開始基準時刻は、契約時に決定されていることとする。エネルギーシフト回数が2回である機器は搭載必須とする
remark.en: Use the device on the assumption that an agreement between service provider and user of devices implementing this class is obtained for energy shift (daytime heating). Note that the standard time to start heating may be determined when establishing a contract. Devices with two energy shifts must implement this function.

propertyName.ja: 昼間沸き上げシフト時刻2での沸き上げ予測電力量
propertyName.en: Expected electric energy at daytime heating shift time 2

descriptions.ja: 「昼間沸き上げ開始基準時刻」に設定された「昼間沸き上げシフト時刻2」での沸き上げに要するシフト2回目の電力量予測値2を示すシフト時刻に応じ、順に13時、15時､17時の各時刻に対応する電力量をWhで示す「シフト時刻毎消費電力確定時刻」に、値が確定し、「昼間沸き上げシフト時刻2」に、各時刻毎データはクリア(0x00000000)される
descriptions.en: This property indicates expected electric energy 2 required for heating (for second time in the shift) for 'daytime heating shift time 2' set as 'daytime standard time to start heating'.This property indicates electric power in Wh according to shift time, corresponding to these times in sequence: 13:00, 15:00, and 17:00.The value is set when a value is determined at a time to determine consumption of electric energy at every shift time and a data at every time is cleared (0x00000000) at the daytime heating shift time 2.

remark.ja: サービス提供者と本クラス搭載機器の利用者間で、エネルギーシフト(昼間沸き上げ)に対し合意が得られている前提で利用する。また、沸き上げ開始基準時刻は、契約時に決定されていることとする。エネルギーシフト回数が2回である機器は搭載必須とする
remark.en: Use the device on the assumption that an agreement between service provider and user of devices implementing this class is obtained for energy shift (daytime heating). Note that the standard time to start heating may be determined when establishing a contract. Devices with two energy shifts must implement this function.

propertyName.ja: 時間あたり消費電力量2
propertyName.en: Consumption of electric energy per hour 2

descriptions.ja: 「昼間沸き上げシフト時刻2」にシフトした時にHP給湯機が、時間当たり消費電力量2を示す「シフト時刻毎消費電力確定時刻」に、値が確定し、「昼間沸き上されるげシフト時刻2」に、各時刻毎データはクリア(0x0000)される
descriptions.en: This property indicates electric energy 2 that the HP water heater consumes per hour when shifting 'daytime heating shift time 2'.The value is set when a value is determined at a time to determine consumption of electric energy at every shift time and a data at every time is cleared (0x0000) at the daytime heating shift time 2.

remark.ja: サービス提供者と本クラス搭載機器の利用者間で、エネルギーシフト(昼間沸き上げ)に対し合意が得られている前提で利用する。また、沸き上げ開始基準時刻は、契約時に決定されていることとする。エネルギーシフト回数が2回である機器は搭載必須とする
remark.en: Use the device on the assumption that an agreement between service provider and user of devices implementing this class is obtained for energy shift (daytime heating). Note that the standard time to start heating may be determined when establishing a contract. Devices with two energy shifts must implement this function.

descriptions.ja: 給湯温度設定値を℃で示す
descriptions.en: Used to specify the temperature of water supplied from the water heater in Celsius, and to acquire the current setting.

descriptions.ja: 風呂温度設定値を℃で示す
descriptions.en: Used to specify (in Celsius) the temperature up to which the water heater will heat bath water, and to acquire the current setting.

descriptions.ja: 風呂湯量を段階数で指定
descriptions.en: The bath hot water volume is specified by a number of steps.

note.ja: 設定可能なステップの最大値は「風呂湯量設定4設定可能最大レベル」で取得する
note.en: The maximum allowable step setting shall be acquired with the 'maximum allowable water volume 4' property.

propertyName.ja: 風呂湯量設定4設定可能最大レベル
propertyName.en: Bath water volume setting4 maximum settable level

descriptions.ja: 風呂湯量設定4の最大段階数
descriptions.en: The maximum settable level is the top step of Bath water volume setting 4.

descriptions.ja: 操作部から出力される音量設定値を設定し、設定状態を取得する
descriptions.en: Used to set the volume output from the operating units and to acquire the setting status.

descriptions.ja: 操作部から出力される音量ミュート状態を設定し、設定状態を取得する
descriptions.en: Used to set the volume mute status output from the operating units and to acquire the setting status.
Mute ON
Mute OFF

descriptions.ja: 給湯可能な湯量を㍑で示す
descriptions.en: This property indicate the remaining hot water volume in liters.

propertyName.en: Surplus electric energy power prediction value

descriptions.ja: 余剰電力量予測値を基点となる時刻を含めて未来24時間分を時系列順に上位バイトからプロパティ値として示す月、日、時
descriptions.en: A 24-hour period in the future, including the time at which the surplus electric power prediction value serves as the base point, is indicated as a property value in time series, beginning with the high-order byte.Month, date, hour.

elementName.ja: １時間単位の余剰電力量予測値
elementName.en: Surplus power prediction value in units of 1 hour

note.ja: surplusEnergyPredictionValueの配列要素の値が-327680である要素は、無効値を意味する
note.en: If the value of an element of surplusEnergyPredictionValue is -327680, the element means invalid value.

propertyName.ja: 冬季H/Pユニット定格消費電力
propertyName.en: Rated power consumption of H/P unit in wintertime

descriptions.ja: 冬季(12、1、2、3月)の沸き上げ時の定格消費電力を示す
descriptions.en: This property indicates the rated power consumption of the heat pump in wintertime. (December to March)

propertyName.ja: 中間期H/Pユニット定格消費電力
propertyName.en: Rated power consumption of H/P unit in in-between seasons

descriptions.ja: 中間期(4、5、10、11月)の沸き上げ時の定格消費電力を示す
descriptions.en: This property indicates the rated power consumption of the heat pump in in-between seasons. (April, May, October, November)

propertyName.ja: 夏季H/Pユニット定格消費電力
propertyName.en: Rated power consumption of H/P unit in summertime

descriptions.ja: 夏季(6、7、8、9月)の沸き上げ時の定格消費電力を示す
descriptions.en: This property indicates the rated power consumption of the heat pump in summertime. (June to September)

descriptions.ja: 沸き上げ湯量設定値を％で示す
descriptions.en: Used to specify (in %) the volume of bath water the bathtub will contain upon completion of heating, and to acquire the current setting.

propertyName.en: Measured amount of water remaining in tank

descriptions.ja: 残湯量計測値を㍑で示す
descriptions.en: This property indicates the measured amount of water left in the tank in liters.

descriptions.ja: タンク容量値を㍑で示す
descriptions.en: This property indicates the tank capacity in liters.

propertyName.en: Automatic Bath Water Heating Mode Setting

descriptions.ja: 風呂自動モード入/解除
descriptions.en: Used to specify whether or not to use the 'automatic bath water heating' mode, and to acquire the current setting.
Automatic bath water heating mode ON
Automatic bath water heating mode OFF

propertyName.ja: 手動風呂追い焚き動作設定

descriptions.en: Used to specify whether or not to use the function to reheat.
Bath reheating ON
Bath reheating OFF

propertyName.en: Addition of hot water function setting

descriptions.en: Used to specify whether or not to use the function to add hot water to the bath water in the bathtub, and to acquire the current setting.
Addition of hot water function ON
Addition of hot water function OFF

propertyName.ja: 手動風呂足し湯動作設定
propertyName.en: Manual bath hot water addition function setting

descriptions.en: Used to specify whether or not to use the function to add hot water to the bath water in the bathtub, and to acquire the current setting.
Addition of hot water function ON
Addition of hot water function OFF

propertyName.en: Slight bath water temperature lowering function setting

descriptions.en: Used to specify whether or not to use the 'lukewarm water temperature lowering' function, and to acquire the current setting.
Lukewarm water temperature function ON
Lukewarm water temperature function OFF

propertyName.ja: 手動風呂ぬるめ動作設定
propertyName.en: Manual lukewarm water temperature lowering function setting.

descriptions.en: Used to specify whether or not to use the 'lukewarm water temperature lowering' function, and to acquire the current setting.
Lukewarm water temperature function ON
Lukewarm water temperature function OFF

descriptions.ja: 風呂湯量を㍑の単位で示す
descriptions.en: Used to specify the bath water volume in liters, and to acquire the current setting.

descriptions.ja: 風呂湯量を8段階で指定
descriptions.en: Used to specify the bath water volume by selecting a level from among the eight predefined levels, and to acquire the current setting.
Used to specify whether or not to use the function of priority bathroom.
Priority bath ON
Priority bath OFF
This property indicates the status of bath operation.
Filling hot water
Stopped
Keeping temperature

descriptions.ja: 風呂湯量を㍑の単位で示す
descriptions.en: Used to specify the bath water volume in liters, and to acquire the current setting.
